description: Top half of a Split Wide layout. Morning mist lifts over the countryside as Swedish troops begin their march toward Jutas. Döbeln rides at the front, pale but upright in the saddle, black headband tied firmly. His sword rests across his lap as soldiers fall into formation behind him.
narration: The march to Jutas begins — discipline over weakness, purpose over pain.
info: Page 5 – March to Jutas. PageType: 2. Scene (panel 1): early morning, Döbeln leading the column toward Jutas.
